forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Lots of sunshine. High around 25C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 78F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 67F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High around 20C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 68F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 22C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 71F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 19C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 66F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain developing after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High near 20C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
